<div class="android-input"> <inheritWrap> <!-- 移除placeholder的绑定放到最后，确保最后触发 --> <!-- <input required ${__all_attrs__} ${--placeholder} > --> <!-- 提升效率，不用placeholder来减少绑定 --> <input required ${__all_attrs__} > <inputPlaceholder>${label}</inputPlaceholder> <inputHighlight></inputHighlight> <inputBar></inputBar> <inputDescription>${description}</inputDescription> </inheritWrap> </div>
